libretube.name: LibreTube
libretube.description: Alternative YouTube frontend for Android, privacy-respecting, no ads.

newpipe.name: NewPipe
newpipe.description: Lightweight YouTube frontend, supports background playback and downloads.

fdroid.name: F-Droid
fdroid.description: Open-source Android app repository, discover libre apps easily.

vanced.name: Vanced MicroG
vanced.description: Required MicroG support for Vanced YouTube to run on Android.
